context: Etsy went public in April 2015 as the leading marketplace for handmade and vintage goods. The company had 1.5M active sellers and 22M active buyers.

competitors.name: eBay
competitors.notes: Auction and fixed-price marketplace with vintage and crafts

competitors.name: Pinterest
competitors.notes: Visual discovery driving traffic to sellers

competitors.name: Shopify
competitors.notes: Enabling sellers to build own stores
